div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 134 Thoricos, near Laurium, Attica, 1969 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (Bingen) Contents: 5 AV, 287 AR Philip II: 1 st. Alexander III: 2 early post. st. (Babylon, Alexandreia) 1 lifetime tetradr. (Pella) Philip III: 1 st. Athens: 1 st. (time of Lachares) 282 tetradr. (4th-early 3rd cent.) 4 triob. (4th cent.) Disposition: Athens To be published by Jean Bingen.
